h2_title: Where to Find the Gore-Eye Daoist
h3_title: Gore-Eye Daoist Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: Defeating him will earn you his Gore-Eye Daoist Spirit to absorb, and you can also help yourself to the second Luojia Fragrant Vine in this chapter to boost your gourd yet again!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gore-Eye_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Gore-Eye Daoist', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Gore-Eye Daoist' and the sub-subsection 'Gore-Eye Daoist Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating him will earn you his Gore-Eye Daoist Spirit to absorb, and you can also help yourself to the second Luojia Fragrant Vine in this chapter to boost your gourd yet again!
